sentences.sContent: The ship had to be towed into the harbor.
sentences.sCn: 那艘轮船不得不被拖进港口。

sentences.sContent: Can you give us a tow to the garage?
sentences.sCn: 你能帮我们把车拖到修车厂吗？

synos.tran: 拖；[纺]麻的粗纤维；拖曳所用之绳

trans.tranOther: to pull a vehicle or ship along behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain
an act of pulling a vehicle behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain
